transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> ExcelDS
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> DSSql
DSConditionSplit@StartC derive(DateColumn = currentDate()) ~> DerivedColumn1
Union1 split(startsWith(AnimalName,'C'),
	disjoint: true) ~> DSConditionSplit@(StartC)
MapDrifted2 derive(code = toString(byName('code')),
		AnimalName = toString(byName('AnimalName')),
		Age = toString(byName('Age'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1, DSSql, MapDrifted2 union(byName: false)~> Union1
ExcelDS derive(code = toString(byName('code')),
		AnimalName = toString(byName('AnimalName')),
		Age = toString(byName('Age'))) ~> MapDrifted2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['sample.txt'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 2,
		ERROR_FUNCTION('')
	)) ~> sink1
